channel.title: Existence PvP
channel.description:
Hello everyone, and this a developers thread, of a server, I've been working on for a while now, and It's based off of Cammy PvP, but heavily modified. Here are some pictures and some information, to get the ball rolling, I hope you enjoy, and want to join Existence Pvp in the near future! ;)
~ Existence PvP ~
• Many well know delta glitches have been fixed, and tested thoroughly for any flaws.
• In any other delta (98%) have a glitch in PvP, and against npcs, where it takes close to ½1 - 2 seconds, too attack a player/npc. It has been fixed almost fully, and improves Pking by a large sum.
• Pk points Exchange - Exchange the points you earn from killing your prey in PvP, be careful though, no cheating, or you won't gain any PkPoints at all.
• Many PvP hot spots, such as: Edgeville, Varrock, Camelot, Pures Palace, Godwars Massacre, Falador, and Lumbridge. More are being though of and added in updates.
• Special Attacks - I've redone almost every special attack that cammy PvP, had and developed them to do much more that they are supposed to.
• Hybridding - Hybridding has been overlooked, and redone, It's much more accurate and a easier process.
• Stability - Stability is much more clean and less laggy, I've taken in the liberty of converting most things, into events!
• Bosses - Just because this is a simple PvP based server, there will be bosses, ingame for either a quick clan break, or just if you like to kill posses as well as pk. Countless bosses have been added ingame, Tormented demons, Kalaphite Queen, King Black Dragon, Corporeal Beast, and much more, all with correct special attacks, and effects.
Client sided features
• Base - I am using a non-renamed, delta client base.
• The client is loading 602 anims and GFX, along with most npcs, and items.
• I'm using a old fashioned 317 Game-frame, with some newer interfaces for easier access to players.
• Here are some pictures to end off this thread •
[i]This thread is being updated over time.[/i]
Fixed that annoying Attacking bug.
[IMG]http://i764.photobucket.com/albums/xx290/yobert30/Fixed.gif[/img]
Just a simple Dungeoneering emote, coded manually.
[IMG]http://i764.photobucket.com/albums/xx290/yobert30/Dungemote.gif[/img]
Some newer revision items.
[IMG]http://i764.photobucket.com/albums/xx290/yobert30/Newitems-1.png[/img]
More pictures will be added, as I'm quite busy and am taking pictures as we speak!

&

i_hollowfied111:

I’ve stated I’m using a non-renamed client. And thanks for some support from some of you. LOL

No Problem Bro, just Glad to see you have support on your project! I know you have my full support not really a delta person but i like to see the old days!! i would for sure play this source Im working on my own server at the moment, Its A Project Insanitiy Base Fixed combat because some reason combat was glitchy on this one, Also cleans out the files they were hella messy! gonna put a great deal of time on it befor realseing it on this !

item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

AtomicInt_:

I’ve used a delta once and I know how to make a server ‘stable’, like a year ago did a stability test, crashed if I remember correctly at 22 bots, no project insanity source in the downloads section can hold more than 70 players before crashing (Except Jin-sanity)

And soon to be Spirit-Scape… will hold like 300 players

PI was never meant to really hold tons of amounts of players…

Read full topic

item.title: Existence PvP
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Bryan Owner_Bryan
item.description:
@Owner_Bryan wrote:

[quote=“i_hollowfied111, post:18, topic:416977”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=518916.msg3771796#msg3771796 date=1317758826]
Excuse me, but a PI is 10x more stable then a delta. PI’s are used through so many different classes that it is much more organized while Delta’s are shit and handle everything through one class and a switch statement. I can, and have already done better then you and no, I am not jealous. L2 Code.
[/quote]

That a boy you tell him bro, screw him your doing good and there nothing no flaming retard can do to change that hes just hating because your better no biggie bro! Fuck him he wants to be a dick let him… hes just making himself look like an idiot !!

Maybe you should learn what your talking about before you go about blabbering on stability. A nomarl PI can hold 250 players max, Deltascape can withhold the same amount as well. There’s very small difference in stability, the difference is the packets, so please stop spamming my thread with nonsense that your mother told you. There’s nothing to be jealous of, you are developing a leeched PI. Woopdie doo, get over it. This is what I enjoy coding, they both take the same amount of knowledge, in your case it takes less cause the guy you leeched the PI source off of coded most of it. Now leave my thread, I don’t need spammers.[/quote]

Read full topic
